Name: Mafia Clicker: City Builder
About the game: Do you have what it takes to become the top Mafia overlord? Create your City by building black market buildings. But choose wisely! Some Buildings are better than others and they must be placed with strategy for maximum effect! Level up and upgrade your Crew to run jobs for you that give you Cash bonuses or special Powers! Features City Building strategy and a full Leaderboard!
